settings.about_text: Omnēque is the home of vintage and antique jewellery, giving a second life to some of the best jewellery treasures on the market. Our collections are boldly curated by industry experts, with intelligent and informative editorial to support them. Omnēque inspires passion and confidence to buy, wear, collect and, most importantly, truly enjoy jewellery.

settings.heading: Email us
settings.subheading: We would love to hear from you. If you have questions about a piece on our site, want to check in on your order or find out more about our services, please get in touch.  Fill out the form, or email us at hello@omneque.com. We will get back to you within one business day.

settings.title: Stamp of Perfection
settings.subheading: Discover our signed antique and vintage jewellery

settings.title: Do You Love Jewellery?
settings.text:
So do we. Omnēque is a luxury online marketplace and magazine where the best jewellery continues its journey to new owners. With a passion for the craft of jewellery and the stories it tells, we have an incredible selection of unique pre-owned pieces authenticated by Joanna Hardy and curated by both Joanna and Vivienne Becker, alongside spotlight partnerships showcasing the best collections from contemporary designer-makers.

Get inspired with the passion and confidence to buy, wear, collect and, most importantly, truly enjoy jewellery.

Nothing tells your story quite like it.

Omnēque’s Stone Vault treasures are selected and vetted by gemmologist Joanna Hardy, Fellow of the Gemmological Association of Great Britain.

settings.buyer_title: “Jewellery is about celebrating individuality, so buy bold, be discerning and enjoy it."
settings.buyer_text:
Joanna Hardy trained as a goldsmith, was one of the first women to be a polished diamond dealer in Antwerp, and later joined Phillips, then Sotheby’s. Since 2009, she has worked as an independent fine jewellery specialist.

She is an Independent Registered Valuer for the National Association of Jewellers UK, and a Fellow of the Gemmological Association. She is also a regular specialist on the BBC's 'Antiques Roadshow'.

settings.buyer_title: “Antique jewellery is where it all began for me, and here I get the chance to show and share the richness of this jewellery history.”
settings.buyer_text:
Vivienne Becker is an award-winning jewellery historian, journalist and author of more than 20 books. These include ‘Art Nouveau Jewelry’, ‘Fabulous Costume Jewelry’, and ‘The Impossible Collection of Jewelry: the 100 Most Important Jewels of the 20th century’.

She is a Contributing Editor to the Financial Times’ 'How To Spend It' magazine, and has worked closely with leading auction houses, writing specialist catalogues.

settings.buyer_title: "I pride myself on curating branded jewellery collections that are collectible, timeless and enviably fashion-focused"
settings.buyer_text:
With a family background in fine antiques, Charlotte combined her two great loves – exquisite objects and fashion – and graduated with 1st Class Hons from the prestigious London College of Fashion before going on to build a reputation as a brand expert in the luxury fashion accessories industry.

Charlotte maintains strong relationships with international clients including high-profile celebrities, society individuals and fashion stylists, and features as the luxury accessories expert on ITV's "Million Pound Pawn".

settings.buyer_title: “Make a statement with vintage fashion jewellery to wear and collect - an ethical and affordable way to add unique style and fun to your look.”
settings.buyer_text:
Carmen Haid is a vintage fashion curator and luxury brands specialist, who started her career as Press Officer at Yves Saint Laurent. Following a stint at British Vogue, she launched the then-unknown brand CELINE under the LVMH umbrella in the UK as Head of Global Communications.

She believes in circular fashion and sustainability and, seeing a market opportunity in 2008, Carmen founded Atelier Mayer.

settings.buyer_title: “I look for the little 'unicorns' of the jewellery world. Jewels created decades and centuries ago and which have survived trends and fashions.”
settings.buyer_text:
Josephine has been immersed in the fine jewellery world for more than 15 years. Having started her career with Sotheby’s Jewellery Department in London, she then worked to establish Jessica McCormack as one of London’s most celebrated diamond jewellers. As a jewellery specialist, Josephine has consulted with fine jewellery brands, auction houses, marketplaces and independent businesses.

Experienced in advising private clients, Josephine sources rare, important and unusual antique and vintage jewellery and gemstones.

Three renowned jewellery experts have found everything you see. Vivienne Becker, a jewellery historian with a knowing eye on modern masters; Joanna Hardy, a gemmologist with an equal eye for fine antique masterpieces; and Charlotte Rogers, a specialist in luxury fashion jewellery. They are discerning. Second rate doesn’t bear a second glance. They source the finest examples of their class. Quality, integrity and charm are cards they play before each piece that is chosen — for you.

settings.sizing_list: Using a length of string or ribbon, wrap it around the base of your finger. To ensure the ring fits comfortably, we suggest measuring your knuckle as well. We recommend selecting a size that will slide on and off your finger easily.
With a pen, mark the point on the string where the ends meet.
Measure the string in millimetres with a ruler.
Choose the closest measurement to the chart below to identify your ring size.

settings.sizing_text:
Welcome to the Omnēque sizing guide.

Whether you are looking for a gift for a loved one or wish to determine the size that fits you best, we are here to help you determine the correct size.
settings.measure_title: How to Measure Your Ring Size
settings.measure_text: To determine your size, we strongly advise that you measure the size of your finger rather than the size of your ring.

settings.title: A Destination for Precious Things
settings.subtext:
Omnēque is a luxury online marketplace where the best jewellery continues its journey to its next owners. We are dedicated to giving new life to precious objects at a time when what and how we buy says everything about who we are.

We continually curate an inspiring selection of unique pre-owned pieces authenticated by top industry experts alongside spotlight partnerships showcasing the best collections from contemporary designer-makers. A true home of jewellery, Omnēque also offers a range of services from our concierge including jewellery sourcing, remodelling and bespoke commissions.
settings.omninue_subtext: /om-neek’/ • [derived from Latin omneque] (noun) precious thing; valuable
settings.mission_subtext:
With a passion for the craft of jewellery and the stories it tells, our mission is to inspire you to collect and style it in your own individual way.

We want to show you jewellery in a new light, and for you to fall in love with it. It will become your story.
settings.story_subtext:
Amanda Zuydervelt was born with business in her bones. A natural entrepreneur, she has a flair for spotting a gap in the market, then working with zeal and spirit to fill it with a product she believes in and loves.

Omnēque is one of a kind, a digital platform that specialises in unique pre-owned jewellery. Amanda has always sought to set up businesses that give something back or pay it forward. Omnēque does both. It’s a luxury online marketplace where the best jewellery continues its journey to its next loving owners.

But this marketplace is so much more than just a shop: it is a unique resource for great jewellery. You can get a ring remodelled or commission a bespoke piece; find someone to help you navigate the minefield of auctions, or help you select the perfect piece for yourself or as a gift for a loved one. And this offering is powered by the elite team Amanda has surrounded herself with, providing the expertise needed, including from Joanna Hardy and Vivienne Becker, fine jewellery experts with more than 80 years’ combined experience.
settings.buyer_subtext:
The true allure of the Omnēque marketplace is that it’s not just a selection of jewellery: it is a collection of curated, authenticated and valued jewellery chosen by our expert buyers who have the experience to identify which pieces have the most appeal and will hold their value.

Their collective knowledge is focused on finding the best pieces from the pre-owned market including fine, high, vintage and antique jewellery and identifying the must-have contemporary designer-makers from around the world.
settings.magazine_subtext:
The Omnēque magazine tells the stories behind some of the world’s most amazing jewellery. It is a constantly refreshed resource to educate, entertain and enlighten.

Edited by Mark C. O’Flaherty, our writers include respected insiders led by Vivienne Becker and Joanna Hardy, bold outliers whose voices represent the consumer’s viewpoint including Kate Spicer, and regular contributors including well-known names from the jewellery and fashion world.
settings.executive_subtext:
Amanda Zuydervelt CEO

Amanda has launched two successful online businesses, with Omnēque being her third e-commerce venture. She also has over 20 years’ experience in the luxury online sector, most recently with Richemont where she managed the digital business for high end jewellery & accessories brands including Montblanc, Panerai and IWC.

Emily Robertson Operations & Logistics

Emily has 20 years’ operations & logistics experience. She spent 8 years with Pippa Small before launching a consultancy in 2016 that specialises in jewellery.

Lori Heiss-Tiplady Brand Director

Lori has over 25 years’ experience in brand management with iconic lifestyle and entertainment brands including Allied Domecq, Disney, MasterChef and The Original Smiley Brand.

settings.title: #6. Pops of Colour
settings.sub_content:
Colour is the emotional key to a jewel. It unlocks our responses, taps into our mood and lifts our spirits. It is the life and soul of a gemstone. With this drop, we welcome spring, green shoots and cherry blossom, and celebrate colours of jewels and gems, of light and life.

Colour is the biggest story in today’s world of jewels: partly because colour taps into our emotions and is the language of creative expression for both designers and wearers of jewellery; partly because colour connects jewellery, fashion and lifestyle. And partly because the discovery of new varieties of coloured gems, and new deposits, particularly in Africa, has given designers an unprecedented palette of colour and light, generating an unquenchable lust for coloured gemstones. Colour can’t be commoditised, however. Here at Omnēque, we bring you the expert eye of gemologist Joanna Hardy, and jewellery historian and trend-expert Vivienne Becker, to help you find your personal Pop of Colour.

settings.title: GET READY!
settings.sub_title: The next Omnēque drop is coming

settings.description: In these crazy times, who couldn't use a little bit of luck? Traditionally, charms were worn to attract good luck; an amulet to provide protection from danger; and a talisman to attract a particular benefit to its owner. We have collected a killer selection of these protective jewels to help you find the one that speaks to you.

It’s the Awards season and the time to sparkle, scintillate and grab the limelight.  Jewels have been a fixture on the Red Carpet since the Golden Age of Hollywood, but in the past few years, jewellery has taken a leading role in the Red Carpet ritual, adding glitz and glam, boosting a star’s image and enhancing personality. We turn the spotlight on Red Carpet-worthy jewels.

settings.title: #7. Art Deco
settings.sub_content: A whole century after the always-chic, always-sophisticated style of Art Deco first appeared, it retains its ability to wow, and remains the go-to period for inspiration for jewellery lovers and jewellery makers alike.

settings.title: #6 Pops of Colour
settings.sub_content:
Colour is the emotional key to a jewel. It unlocks our responses, taps into our mood and lifts our spirits. It is the life and soul of a gemstone. With this drop, we welcome spring, green shoots and cherry blossom, and celebrate colours of jewels and gems, of light and life.

Colour is the biggest story in today’s world of jewels: partly because colour taps into our emotions and is the language of creative expression for both designers and wearers of jewellery; partly because colour connects jewellery, fashion and lifestyle. And partly because the discovery of new varieties of coloured gems, and new deposits, particularly in Africa, has given designers an unprecedented palette of colour and light, generating an unquenchable lust for coloured gemstones. Colour can’t be commoditised, however. Here at Omnēque, we bring you the expert eye of gemologist Joanna Hardy, and jewellery historian and trend-expert Vivienne Becker, to help you find your personal Pop of Colour.

settings.title: Stone Vault
settings.sub_content:
Simply put, we curate the stone selection, and you choose the stone that speaks to you. Whether you’re building your own stone collection or are looking for the right gem to set in a bespoke jewel, we’re here with specialist knowledge. 

Joanna Hardy: “Choosing a stone from the Stone Vault is an opportunity to fall in love with a stone with the reassurance that it has been checked by me. Every stone is unique as nature does not make copies. Often, it is only the ‘Big Five’ – diamond, ruby, emerald, sapphire and pearl – that we are told should gain our attention, but there is a whole host of other minerals that are equally mesmerising which would look stunning in a piece of jewellery or indeed be included in a stone collection.’

With coloured gemstones, as the name suggests, it’s all about the colour: if a stone makes you look twice at it then it may be the stone for you. 

There are three characteristics you should look for in colour: hue, in terms of the overall colour; saturation, meaning the colour needs to be even throughout; and tone, which relates to the lightness and darkness of the colour. Natural impurities in the gem called inclusions are the stone’s DNA; inclusions were formed either at the same time as the host material or evolved as the mineral travelled up to the earth’s surface. These inclusions give the gem its unique character.

settings.title:
Givenchy 70th
Anniversary Edit
settings.subheading: From the cheerful to chunky, from rhinestone rebellion to rock chick chic, vintage fashion jewellery from Givenchy, as it celebrates its 70th anniversary, is perpetually versatile.

settings.title: Mother's Day
settings.subheading: There is no one more special than your Mother, and with Mother’s Day just around the corner, it’s time to treat her. We’re here to help you discover that unique and precious piece of jewellery that will make her day shine. Our personal shoppers can help find the perfect Mother’s Day gift.

settings.title: Lucia Silvestri | Bulgari
settings.subheading: 10 Things to Know About Bulgari’s Jewellery Creative Director

settings.title: Our Jewellery
settings.subtitle: Omnēque is the online destination for jewels with experience: our pre-owned selection of high jewellery, fine jewellery, antique jewellery and vintage fashion jewellery has been curated by our expert buyers. This selection is frequently updated with new drops from our buying team, so check back regularly to discover new treasures.

settings.title: We find precious jewelled adornments, some created years
Edits
settings.subtitle:
Let our collections inspire you.

The best, chosen by the best: our selections have been refined and edited by our leading curators.

settings.title1: RARITIES is Omneque’s expertly and passionately curated collection of the rarest, most exceptional and extraordinary antique and 20th century jewellery.
settings.subtitle1: Presented twice yearly, to our registered clients, in a specially created Look Book, with full descriptions, historical details and style notes, Rarities is Omneque’s answer to Haute Couture. Our curators scour the world to search out and carefully select the jewels they believe are the finest, most exquisite, most important and thrilling available on the market.
settings.subtitle2: They source Rarities from the world’s specialist merchants and dealers, most of whom are inaccessible to the public, all impassioned and knowledgeable experts, positioned in the inner sanctum of the somewhat secretive, often impenetrable world of antique jewellery.
settings.title2: Rarities is a collection of one-of-a-kind masterpieces that bring together the strongest style and spirit of their age, the most refined craftsmanship and rare, beautiful gemstones and pearls.
settings.subtitle3: In tune with today’s demand, our focus is on Signed 20th Century jewellery, by the great makers and Maisons, but we will also offer earlier jewels, exquisite creations from the 18th or 19th centuries.  Our experts keep wearability foremost in mind, selecting jewels from yesterday that suit today’s fashions, tastes, lifestyles.  Ravishing Rarities. Created then, curated now.

settings.category_text:
Every product on the Omnēque marketplace has been hand-picked by our professional buyers; industry insiders with unparalleled experience in the jewellery world. We have scoured the globe to curate the very best in rare jewellery finds and current iconic pieces from top designer-makers. However, if you need extra help deciding on the perfect piece, our team of stylists are on hand to ensure that finding a unique gift or sourcing an exquisite piece to add to your collection will be a magical adventure rather than a daunting task. The team will take a brief on what you are looking for and how much you want to spend before sending you a suggested list of options by email, or talking you through a selection over Zoom.

Contact Personal Shopping

If you’ve fallen in love with an iconic jewellery piece or have a wish list of items you desire but don’t have time to source, our team of buyers can take the effort out of your quest. Send us your wish list and we will alert our trusted dealers so that you will be the first to know when these pieces come to market. Additionally, our jewellery team can source a Sold item or rare piece through our global network, securing and checking the piece is genuine and delivering it right to your front door. If it’s available, our experts will find it for you.

Get in touch

Buying an item at auction can be an unnerving experience. Leave it to our expert buyer, who has worked with auction houses for over 20 years and can help to make it a fascinating and successful journey. She will view and video the items you desire, sharing her knowledge in a detailed report which would include her valuation. If you decide to purchase, the buyer can undertake the bidding or advise you on how best to go about this for maximum enjoyment and minimum risk.

Get in touch

Create something truly unique and personal to you using our stable of iconic jewellery designers. Our fine jewellery specialists will be there to hold your hand, giving you insight into current trends and recommending designers that perfectly fit your style and tastes. Our service will support you through every stage of the design process. From drawings to choosing gems and materials, we will ensure that your vision becomes the quintessential bespoke piece.

Get in touch

The world of jewellery has an air of mystique about it, and sometimes it can be daunting to navigate your way through it. The experts at Omnēque have pooled their collective knowledge to help our customers move through the world of jewellery with confidence. Come with us Through the Loupe, where you will find a treasure trove of information including designer bios, a ring sizing guide and a glossary of jewellery terms.

settings.banner_text:
Omnēque boasts an unparalleled team of industry experts dedicated to helping you to own the finest gems and jewellery. As a registered member, you can benefit from this unrivalled team through our Personal Shopping service. We’re here to help you source, design, repurpose and maintain your gems to build an exquisite collection of heritage pieces or find an exquisite gift.

Register with Omnēque and discover our unique services below.

settings.title: An Exclusive Selection of Latest News

settings.text:
Just between you and us…

Sign up for exclusive previews of the very best of our jewels, selected by our curators for private viewing only, never to be seen online.

Just between you and us…

Sign up for exclusive previews of the very best of our jewels, selected by our curators for private viewing only, never to be seen online.

settings.heading: Sell With Omneque
settings.subheading: Sell your pre-loved jewellery with us.Welcome to our new “Sell with Omneque” service, which gives you the chance to have a neglected or long-forgotten jewel valued and for it to find a new life. Why not use what you gain from a sale to invest in something new: to change your style or maybe find a new piece of jewellery holding different meaning.

settings.heading: What to sell?
settings.subheading: It could be a piece of jewellery that’s no longer loved, or a piece that, forany number of reasons, you can’t ever see yourself wearing again. Is it an antique treasure? Is it vintage fashion? Is it fine jewellery that never sees the light of day? We will look, assess, value, and sell. It’s as easy as that.

settings.title: Why Sell with Omneque
settings.text: We have an expert curation and authentication team who compile our valuations, and we will only adopt pieces of jewellery which we see and love, and which we feel are relevant to the rest of the Omneque offering.

settings.title: Christmas Gift Ideas 2021
settings.subtitle:
Our Christmas edit has you covered - in beautiful vintage and fashion jewellery that is.

From the sweetest Victorian fringe earrings to major signed pieces by Cartier et al, rare finds and knock out fashion jewellery from yesteryear, we’ve got the most beautiful things to fill those little - and not so little - parcels under the tree.

settings.title: About the shop
settings.text: Use this text area to tell your customers about your brand and vision. You can change it in the theme settings.

settings.heading: Email us
settings.subheading: Send us an email through the form. We usually respond within one business day.

settings.title: This is your slideshow
settings.subheading: Use it to set your brand's tone and create a first impression with your customers. Vibrant imagery with a lot of background accent works well for a full-screen effect.

settings.title: This is the Rich text section
settings.text: Use this text area to share information about your brand with your customers. Describe a product, share announcements, or welcome customers to your store.

settings.heading: This is the Collage.
settings.subheading: Mix and match between large portrait blocks and small landscape blocks.

settings.heading: Have control over your content
settings.subheading: Each block has text placement and max width options so you can fine tune your message and balance it with your imagery.

settings.quote: Absolutely unparalleled products and service. I'm confident that this store will be the next big thing in its industry, and that its products will be timeless.
settings.author: Steve Jordans

settings.title: Full width image section
settings.subheading: This section can be used to organize page content into different areas, or along with the Collage section to create a magazine-style layout.
